/opt/ohpc/pub/apps/cuda-11.2/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  -arch=sm_50 -O3 -DNDEBUG -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkArg.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkCUDA.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkDataset.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkDirectory.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkExit.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkExport.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkFile.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkImage.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkImport.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkInit.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkLogger.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkMPI.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkPPM.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkPath.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkSolution.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkSparse.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkTimer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/gputkUtils.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/libgputk/vendor/json11.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/gputk.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -lm -lcuda -lrt
